verses.verse: And it came to <S%H8010>pass<s%>, when Solomon had <S%H3615>finished<s%> the <S%H1129>building<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, and all <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>'s <S%H2837>desire<s%> which he was <S%H2654>pleased<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%>,
that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the second <S%H8145>time<s%>, as he had <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto him at <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8085>him<s%>, I have heard thy <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and thy <S%H8467>supplication<s%>, that thou hast <S%H2603>made<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6942>me<s%>: I have hallowed this <S%H1004>house<s%>, which thou hast <S%H1129>built<s%>, to <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> there <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>; and mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and my <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall be there <S%H3117>perpetually<s%>.

And as for <S%H3212>thee<s%>, if thou wilt walk <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1732>me<s%>, as David thy <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%>, in <S%H8537>integrity<s%> of <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and in <S%H3476>uprightness<s%>, to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H8104>thee<s%>, and wilt keep my <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and mine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>;

then I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of thy <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, according as I <S%H1696>promised<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, There shall not <S%H3772>fail<s%> thee a <S%H376>man<s%> upon the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

But if ye <S%H7725>shall<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> away from <S%H310>following<s%> <S%H1121>me<s%>, ye or your children, and not <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and my <S%H2708>statutes<s%> which I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1980>you<s%>, but shall go and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and worship <S%H7812>them<s%>;

then will I cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>out<s%> of the <S%H127>land<s%> which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H1004>them<s%>; and this house, which I have <S%H6942>hallowed<s%> for my <S%H8034>name<s%>, will I cast <S%H7971>out<s%> of my <S%H6440>sight<s%>; and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be a <S%H4912>proverb<s%> and a <S%H8148>byword<s%> among all <S%H5971>peoples<s%>.

And though this <S%H1004>house<s%> is so <S%H5945>high<s%>, yet shall every one that <S%H5674>passeth<s%> by it be <S%H8074>astonished<s%>, and shall <S%H8319>hiss<s%>; and they shall <S%H559>say<s%>, Why hath <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> thus unto this <S%H776>land<s%>, and to this <S%H1004>house<s%>?

and they shall <S%H559>answer<s%>, Because they <S%H5800>forsook<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>, who brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and laid <S%H2388>hold<s%> on <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%> <S%H5647>them<s%>, and served <S%H3068>them<s%>: therefore hath Jehovah <S%H935>brought<s%> all this evil upon <S%H7451>them<s%>.

And it came to pass at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, wherein <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%>, the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>

(now <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> had <S%H5375>furnished<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> with <S%H730>cedar<s%> - <S%H6086>trees<s%> and <S%H1265>fir<s%> - <S%H6086>trees<s%>, and with <S%H2091>gold<s%>, according to all his <S%H2656>desire<s%>), that <S%H227>then<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1551>Galilee<s%>.

And <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H3474>him<s%>; and they pleased him not.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, What <S%H5892>cities<s%> are these which thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H251>me<s%>, my brother? And he <S%H7121>called<s%> them the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3521>Cabul<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
And <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3967>sixscore<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And this is the <S%H1697>reason<s%> of the <S%H4522>levy<s%> which <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5927>raised<s%>, to <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and his own <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H4407>Millo<s%>, and the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H2674>Hazor<s%>, and <S%H4023>Megiddo<s%>, and <S%H1507>Gezer<s%>.

Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> had gone <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H3920>taken<s%> <S%H1507>Gezer<s%>, and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> it with <S%H784>fire<s%>, and <S%H2026>slain<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H5414>given<s%> it for a <S%H7964>portion<s%> unto his <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>.
And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1507>Gezer<s%>, and <S%H1032>Beth-horon<s%> the <S%H8481>nether<s%>,
and <S%H1191>Baalath<s%>, and <S%H8412>Tamar<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%>,

and all the <S%H4543>store<s%> - <S%H5892>cities<s%> that <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5892>had<s%>, and the cities for his <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> for his <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>, and <S%H2837>that<s%> which <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H2836>desired<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> for his pleasure in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and in <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, and in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of his <S%H4475>dominion<s%>.

As for all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were <S%H3498>left<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, the <S%H2850>Hittites<s%>, the <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%>, the <S%H2340>Hivites<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%>, who were not of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;

their <S%H1121>children<s%> that were <S%H3498>left<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them in the <S%H776>land<s%>, whom the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were not <S%H3201>able<s%> utterly to <S%H2763>destroy<s%>, of them did <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5927>raise<s%> a <S%H4522>levy<s%> of <S%H5647>bondservants<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

But of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5414>make<s%> no <S%H5650>bondservants<s%>; but they were the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>, and his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and his <S%H8269>princes<s%>, and his <S%H7991>captains<s%>, and <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of his <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and of his <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>.

These were the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H5324>officers<s%> that were over <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>'s <S%H4399>work<s%>, <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%>, who bare <S%H7287>rule<s%> over the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H6213>wrought<s%> in the <S%H4399>work<s%>.

But <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> unto her <S%H1004>house<s%> which Solomon had <S%H1129>built<s%> for <S%H1129>her<s%>: then did he build <S%H4407>Millo<s%>.

And <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> a <S%H8141>year<s%> did <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%> and <S%H8002>peace-offerings<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> which he <S%H1129>built<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, burning <S%H6999>incense<s%> <S%H4196>therewith<s%>, upon the altar that was <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>. So he <S%H7999>finished<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> a navy of <S%H590>ships<s%> in <S%H6100>Ezion-geber<s%>, which is beside <S%H359>Eloth<s%>, on the <S%H8193>shore<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>.

And <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> in the <S%H590>navy<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, <S%H582>shipmen<s%> that had <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, with the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>.

And they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H211>Ophir<s%>, and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> from thence <S%H2091>gold<s%>, <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> it to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>.
